document.full_text: nasdaq omx group inc  named a bank of america merrill lynch  investment banker as chief financial officer on thursday, bringing in a seasoned dealmaker as it pursues a takeover bid of nyse euronext .
document.title: nasdaq hires investment banker shavel as new cfo
